summary: This document consists of email correspondence primarily between Richard Kahn and Chad Markland regarding a financial transfer issue involving shares. Kahn is inquiring about a transfer of shares that appears to have been processed incorrectly, and Markland is providing updates on the status of the correction. The communication highlights the importance of accurate financial transactions and the roles of the individuals involved.

persons.name: Chad Markland
persons.context: Chad Markland is responding to Richard Kahn's inquiries about a financial transfer issue, assuring him that the matter is being addressed.

persons.name: Richard Kahn
persons.context: Richard Kahn is inquiring about the status of a transfer of shares that has not been completed as expected.

persons.name: Jeanne Brennan
persons.context: Jeanne Brennan is included in the email correspondence but does not actively participate in the discussion.

connections.description: Richard Kahn is seeking assistance from Chad Markland regarding a financial transfer issue.
Jeanne Brennan is copied on the correspondence, indicating a professional relationship.

events.title: DTC Transfer Request Submitted
events.description: A DTC transfer request was submitted on this date, which is related to the shares in question.

events.title: Follow-up on Transfer Issue
events.description: Richard Kahn follows up with Chad Markland regarding the incomplete transfer of shares.

locations: 575 Lexington Avenue, 4th Floor, New York, NY 10022
keyFacts: Richard Kahn is inquiring about a transfer of 3,000,000 shares that has not been completed.
Chad Markland is working to correct the transfer issue and has confirmed with his back office.
The DTC transfer request related to the shares was submitted on May 29, 2019.
There is a small amount of cash remaining in the account from interest posted on the same day the wire of cash went out.
Jeanne Brennan is included in the correspondence but does not actively participate.
